net.bubbaland.trivia.client

Class TriviaPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • net.bubbaland.trivia.client.TriviaPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TriviaDialogPanel, TriviaMainPanel

    public class TriviaPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Abstract class providing common methods for all trivia panels.
    Author:
    Walter Kolczynski
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  TriviaPanel.InternalScrollPane
      A scroll pane designed to be used inside of another scroll pane.
      class  TriviaPanel.QuestionPane
      A custom text pane that automatically replaces references to visual trivia with hyperlinks to the web page with the visual trivia.

        Adds a word-wrapping text pane inside of a scrollable pane to the panel that can process hyperlink clicks. A reference to the text pane is returned so the text can be read/changed later.
